Our Story Our Approach Customer Success Stories Advantages of the Cloud Careers Blog Contact Us Book a Demo Digitalisation partner for microfinance Musoni supports organisations around the world with its award winning core banking solutions. Transform your business Improve efficiency, reduce costs and launch new products & services with our cloud banking platform used by financial organisations all around the world. Customer Success Good Brothers’ and Musoni System Impact GBS adopted the Musoni System as part of their digitalization journey in July 2021 with a portfolio of 13K clients and 33K loans. READ CASE STUDY VisionFund Myanmar Improved efficiency & digitalised field operations for over 350k end clients. READ CASE STUDY MicroLoan Foundation Rapid growth, and digitalised data capture for 90k clients across Malawi, Zambia & Zimbabwe. READ CASE STUDY Hayman Microfinance Doubled client numbers & portfolio size each year since launching Musoni. READ CASE STUDY Proximity Finance Agricultural Finance specialist places Musoni at the core of their digitalisation journey. READ CASE STUDY READ MORE PARTNER STORIES Financial Insitutions 0 End Clients 0 Countries 0 Musoni core banking platform Begin your digitalisation journey with our award-winning solution. Cloud Based All you need to access the Musoni System is a reliable internet connection and a modern web browser – we guarantee an up-time of over 99.97%. Per Client Pricing Flexible and affordable pricing structure enabling MFIs to benefit regardless of their size. Award Winning Winner of multiple awards for technology, financial inclusion & innovation in microfinance. Digital Field Application Improve loan officer efficiency, extend outreach and increase revenue with the revolutionary Musoni DFA. Mobile Money Integration Integrated with MMT services around the world, enabling clients to repay their loans and deposit their savings over their mobile phones. SMS Module Stay connected with your customers with our personalised and automated SMS module. LEARN MORE Introducing Musoni Starter Begin your digitalisation journey with our Budget-Friendly System for small business and startups.
